alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:32PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern San Diego County through 315 PM PDT... At 231 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boulevard, or 8 miles southwest of I-8 Between Boulevard And Imperial County Line. This storm was nearly stationary along the Mexico US border. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Laguna, I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard, I-8 Between Boulevard And Imperial County Line, Cuyamaca Rancho State Park, Pine Valley, Hwy S2 Vallecito Creek Rd, Hwy S2 Between Canebrake And Imperial County Line, Boulevard, Lake Morena, Campo, Hwy S2 Between Agua Caliente And Canebrake, Descanso, Hwy S1 Between Lake Cuyamaca And Mount Laguna, Potrero, La Posta Indian Reservation, Canebrake, Tierra Del Sol, Campo Indian Reservation, Live Oak Springs and Jacumba. TIME...MOT...LOC 2131Z 231DEG 606KT 3255 11628 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
